---
id: password-length
title: "Password length"
description: "The API returns the minimum and maximum password length requirements for a given domain. It enables clients to validate and implement password policies based on the specified domain."
sidebar_label: "Password length"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Password length"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/userDetails/passwordLength"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API returns the minimum and maximum password length requirements for a given domain. It enables clients to validate and implement password policies based on the specified domain.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}

  open={true}

    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"domain","in":"query","description":"The domain for which the password length requirment is requested. e.g: **dataseers.in**","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"dataseers.in"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><details
